## EPIC-1: Ledger Core

<a id="epic-1-ledger-core"></a>


<a id="epic-1-ledger-core"></a>

- [ ] Implement GitLedger.append (CAS update-ref)
- [ ] Canonical JSON (sorted keys) serializer
- [ ] CLI: `gatos event add`
- [ ] Tests:
  - [ ] concurrent append,
  - [ ] deny audit

## EPIC-2: Policy VM

<a id="epic-2-policy-vm"></a>


<a id="epic-2-policy-vm"></a>

- [ ] RGS→RGC compiler
- [ ] Pure interpreter (no I/O)
- [ ] `gatos policy check`
- [ ] Tests: deterministic verdicts

## EPIC-3: Fold Engine Integration

<a id="epic-3-fold-engine-integration"></a>


<a id="epic-3-fold-engine-integration"></a>

- [ ] Echo FoldEngine adapter
- [ ] `gatos fold` + checkpoints
- [ ] Golden vectors across OS/arch

## EPIC-4: Message Bus

<a id="epic-4-message-bus"></a>


<a id="epic-4-message-bus"></a>

- [ ] Topics/shards;
- [ ] publish/subscribe
- [ ] Acks & commitments;
- [ ] dedupe
- [ ] Tests:
  - [ ] exactly-once torture

## EPIC-5: Sessions

<a id="epic-5-sessions"></a>


<a id="epic-5-sessions"></a>

- [ ] start
- [ ] undo
- [ ] fork
- [ ] merge
- [ ] lattice/DPO joins for conflicts

## EPIC-6: CAS & Opaque Pointers

- [ ] Rekey;
- [ ] export policy controls

- [ ] `/readyz`,
